column4: ok, my root folder is set to /media/hdc5, which is supposed to be /dev/hdc5, and i think this is the reason why it wont boot
and yeah, what is journaling file system?

journaling file system is kind of like extra cache space or swap space that the ext filesystem uses. Its better than ext2 I think. I think its ext2 with journaling. It functions a lot like ext2 though and has same support
